onbon.y2
Class Y2DiagnosisTool

java.lang.Object
  onbon.y2.Y2DiagnosisTool

public class Y2DiagnosisTool
extends java.lang.Object

The diagnosis tool executes Linux based command on the Y2.

Invoke screen.diagnosis() to get a instance.

Author:
ONBON
